post.date: Posted: Mon Sep 19, 2005 3:59 pm Post subject: New Prey Q&A at computerandvideogames (sept/05)
post.author: zeh
post.body:
Kinda short, but nice.

Quote:
Finally, could you give us one more reason why Prey is going to kick our lily asses?

Scott Miller: The game has the best opening level of any FPS game yet made. We've not shown this to anyone yet, but the game does not start in the bar room with the alien abduction. That's level two, which is a flashback level.


Here.
_________________

zeh

post.date: Posted: Mon Sep 19, 2005 4:17 pm Post subject:
post.author: kat
post.body:
Heh, never mind about enemies spawning behind you.. you've now got to worry about them spawning *above* you as well.!

post.date: Posted: Wed Sep 21, 2005 4:53 pm Post subject: Re: New Prey Q&A at computerandvideogames (sept/05)
post.author: pbmax
post.body:
zeh wrote:
The game has the best opening level of any FPS game yet made.


developer's speak for:

"prey will have a pretty nifty opening level, but you'll probably be disappointed because i just hyped it up too much."
